m_szDocTitle: Elon Musk Making $1 Tesla Salary, But $4.3 Million On Model X Planning | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Elon Musk Making $1 Tesla Salary, But $4.3 Million On Model X Planning August 19th, 2013 by Zachary Shahan   Here’s a fun fact: Elon Musk, the co-founder, CEO, and Product Architect of Tesla, has an annual salary of $1 at Tesla. However, that doesn’t tell the full story. The 21st century Renaissance man gets a bit more for meeting specific performance targets. In quarter 2 of 2013, Tesla’s financial reports show that Elon earned $4.3 million in stock-based pay thanks to the progress he and the Tesla team made on the forthcoming Model X . The Model X is a beautiful electric SUV with falcon-wing
